newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australis in US$105 mln finance deal.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australis in US$105 mln finance deal.

text.p: Australis Media Ltd said on Tuesday a consortium involving Kerry Packer's Publishing and Broadcasting Ltd and Lenfest Communications Inc would provide the company with US$105 million of equity finance.
Australis also said it had concluded a joint venture agreement to share DTH satellite infractructure with fellow pay television operator Optus Vision.
